author: Topsy
description:
It’s that time of year again: Black Friday is just around the corner. Even for the tabletop hobby, it has become one of the biggest shopping events of the year. No surprise, then, that many online shops and manufacturers are keen to stretch this period as much as possible. In this post, we’ve put together the best early hobby deals for you, from Warhammer Merch, Green Stuff World, Taschengelddieb, and Wayland Games.

The post ToP Tip: Early Black Week hobby deals appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: ToP Tip: Early Black Week hobby deals
